author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Pete Souza's Best Instagrams Trolling Donald Trump -Obama's Photographer Is Trolling Trump
text:
If you don't follow former White House photographer Pete Souza on Instagram, you should, because a) his photos offer amazing behind-the-scenes access to the Obama administration and b) he's been lowkey trolling Donald Trump with the following hilarious posts. (P.S. Stay up-to-date on all the Trump antics described below here .)
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 1. When reports surfaced that Trump's team couldn't find White House light switches and were meeting in the dark, Souza shared this:
Those damn lights ;)
A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Feb 6, 2017 at 7:33am PST
2. When news broke that Trump told Mexican president Enrique Peña Nieto that he needed to deal with "bad hombres," Souza shared a snap of Obama and Peña Nieto having drinks.
This one is for Grover. President Obama sampling some tequila with President Enrique Peña Nieto of Mexico in 2013. @heygrover
A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Jan 31, 2017 at 6:18pm PST
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 3. When Trump tried to institute an immigration ban, Souza went ahead and published this photo of Obama talking to a refugee.
Talking with a young refugee at a Dignity for Children Foundation classroom in 2015.
A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Jan 29, 2017 at 5:16am PST
4. When Trump pissed off literally all of Australia after his news-making phone call with Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull, Souza posted this:
Talking with then Prime Minister John Key of New Zealand, left, and Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull of Australia last September at the ASEAN gala dinner.
A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Feb 2, 2017 at 2:21pm PST
Find more amazing posts from Souza here , and BTW, sometimes he trolls Obama, too. *wink*
Nice to see pics online of my former boss kite surfing last week. He did occasionally body surf during Christmas break in Hawaii every year.
A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Feb 7, 2017 at 11:33am PST
From: Marie Claire
